explains: n. 麦加（沙特阿拉伯一座城市）；众人渴望去的地方

sentences.en: Some 50,000 Nigerian Muslims annually go on the Hajj to Mecca in Saudi Arabia.
sentences.cn: 每年，大概有5万名尼日利亚伊斯兰教徒去沙特阿拉伯的麦加朝圣。

sentences.en: Lying back on my bed, I noticed an arrow on the ceiling—pointing to Mecca.
sentences.cn: 躺在床上的时候，我注意到天花板上有一个箭头——指向麦加。

sentences.en: Several men wash their hands and faces with water from teakettles and kneel toward Mecca for evening prayers.
sentences.cn: 一些人用水壶里的水洗手和脸后，朝麦加方向跪下，进行晚间祈祷。
